item.title: Hong Kong court finds pro-democracy activist Jimmy Lai guilty of sedition and collusion with foreign forces
item.description: The 78-year-old was charged under Hong Kong's controversial national security law, enacted by Beijing in 2020.

item.title: To justify martial law, former South Korean President Yoon tried to provoke North Korea, prosecutors say
item.description: Yoon and his military commanders tried to lure North Korea into mounting an armed aggression against the South, thereby creating grounds for martial l...

item.title: Two U.S. soldiers and an interpreter killed in suspected Islamic State attack in Syria
item.description: Two Army soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed by a suspected Islamic State attacker who targeted a convoy of U.S. and Syrian forces.

item.title: Judge says Comey evidence was wrongfully retained, creating hurdle for new charges

item.title: U.S. Veterans Affairs agency plans as many as 35,000 health-care job cuts this month, Washington Post reports
